title: Ryan Tannehill sucks
description: Ryan Tannehill sucks and will get replaced this season at QB. I don't think he's good.

title: Bijan Robinson does not suck
description: Bijan Robinson does not suck and will play well this season. As long as the asshats in my league don't pick him before I do, victories will ensue.

title: Jordan Love, who knows?
description: I'm unsure if Jordan Love sucks or does not suck. He kind of sucked against the Chiefs, but did not suck against the Eagles. Time will tell...
